# DevGraph Project - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
DevGraph is a modular TypeScript library for visualizing cross-platform developer contributions.

## Progress Tracking
- [x] Create .github directory and copilot-instructions.md
- [x] Setup monorepo structure with workspaces
- [x] Create @devgraph/core package
- [x] Create @devgraph/react package
- [x] Create React demo application
- [x] Setup build configuration
- [x] Create GitHub Actions workflow
- [x] Create documentation
- [x] Install dependencies and build

## Architecture
- Monorepo using npm workspaces
- `@devgraph/core`: Framework-agnostic API client (GitHub & GitLab)
- `@devgraph/react`: React component with Tailwind CSS
- `examples/react-demo`: Vite + React demo application
- Modern TypeScript with ES modules
